sourcesContent:
import Header from "../common/Header"; import ann from "./images/ann.png"; import add from "./images/add.png"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import DUMMY_DATA from "./announcements.json"; const HomePage = () => { const [announcements, setAnnouncements] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("announcements.json") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setAnnouncements(data)); }, []); return ( <>

Announcement

Announcement Section

Create Announcement

Notify all students of your announcement

Announcements

    {announcements.map((announcement) => (
  • {announcement.title} {announcement.date}

    {announcement.details}

    • ))}
); }; export default HomePage;
